text: Michael Arthur "Mike" Lauen (born February 9, 1961) is a former professional ice hockey player who played three games in the National Hockey League. He played for the Winnipeg Jets. == External links == * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:American men's ice hockey forwards Category:Ice hockey people from Minnesota Category:Sportspeople from Edina, Minnesota Category:Michigan Tech Huskies men's ice hockey players Category:Winnipeg Jets (1979–1996) draft picks Category:Winnipeg Jets (1979–1996) players
title: Michael Lauen
